bibl.title: Letter from George W. Goethals to John J. Moran, November 18, 1915

div1.p: Goethals provides Moran with a transcript of Moran's service record and acknowledges his resignation from the Health Department.

div1.head: Letter from George W. Goethals to John J. Moran, November 18, 1915
div1.opener:
CABLE ADDRESS:
“PANCANAL, PANAMA”
THE PANAMA CANAL
CANAL ZONE
EXECUTIVE DEPARTMENT
Balboa Heights,
November 18, 1915.
Mr. John J. Moran,
P.O. Box 72, Panama, R. P.
S i r:
div1.p:
On my return to the Isthmus from a recent visit to the
States, it was brought to my attention that you had submitted your
resignation during my absence with the intention of engaging in
private business in the city of Panama.

While I feel assured that you will succeed in your new
field of endeavor, I am equally certain that the Health Department,
under which you have served so many years, has suffered a distinct
loss through the termination of your services, which are reported
to me by the Chief Health Officer as having been excellent in
every respect throughout the entire period of your employment.
The following is a transcript of your service record under the
Isthmian Canal Commission and The Panama Canal, which speaks for
itself:

Employed as sanitary inspector at $100 a month, July 19, 1904.
Promoted to clerk at $125 a month, September 9, 1904.
Reduced to sanitary inspector at $100 a month, January 16, 1905.
Promoted to $125 a month, May 26, 1905.
Promoted to $150 a month, June 1, 1906.
Resigned, effective July 13, 1906.
Re-employed as timekeeper at $125 a month, March 1, 1907.
Promoted to $145 a month, April 16, 1907.
Re-rated clerk at $145 a month, August 1, 1907.
Promoted to $162.50 a month, October 1, 1907.
Re-rated storekeeper at $162.50 a month, April 1, 1906.
Promoted to $175 a month, July 16, 1908.
Promoted to $208.33 a month, April 1, 1911.
Reduced to $175 a month, July 1, 1911.
Promoted to $200 a month, July 1, 1913.
Resigned, effective June 30, 1915.
General workmanship and general conduct - excellent.
I wish you every success in your business venture.
